memberdef.name: R_CHECK
memberdef.initializer: do { \ const xAOD::TReturnCode result = EXP; \ if( ! result.isSuccess() ) { \ ::Error( CONTEXT, XAOD_MESSAGE( "Failed to execute: %s" ), \ #EXP ); \ return 1; \ } \ } while( false )

briefdescription.para: Function checking the payload of the merged file.

detaileddescription.para: This function is used to check that the file merging produced a reasonable looking output.

parameterdescription.para: The merged file's name to test
The mode with which the file was merged

briefdescription.para: Function checking just one auxiliary branch in the merged file.
